Name: Tiny Rogues
About the game: Tiny Rogues is a fantasy rogue-lite dungeon crawler with rpg and bullet hell elements. Defeat all enemies in one room after another and choose the next reward you'll gain! At the end of each floor, you have to face a difficult boss encounter! Level up and build a powerful and unique character! Key Features: Fight against rooms filled with enemies! Adventure through 10 uniquely themed dungeon floors with a total of 19 different boss encounters to defeat! Dodge incoming bullet-hell-like attacks! Level up and chose traits from a selection of over 60 different passive skills to power up your character! Specialize your build in one of 3 core build archetypes, melee , ranged and magic ! Discover over 200 different weapons and equipment items that will make each run feel unique ! Unlock 10 different character classes with unique passive skills! Become permanently stronger by collecting souls to spend at the bonfire to unlock starting gift items and passive blessings which apply to each run!
